maml:description.maml:para: Get Alerts Information

The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.

Sort Order

Supported time range values - 1h, 1d, 7d, 30d (Default is 1d)

maml:description.maml:para: Create or update an action rule.
Set-AzActionRule creates or updates an action rule.

maml:Description.maml:para: Action Group Id which is to be notified.
Action rule Json format
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Contains:smartgroups

Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Equals:/subscriptions/ad825170-845c-47db-8f00-11978947b089/resourceGroups/abvarma/providers/microsoft.insights/metricAlerts/test-mrmc-vm-abvarma
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with Azure.
Description of Action Rule
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Contains:Test Alert
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. NotEquals:Resolved
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Equals:Platform,Log Analytics
Action rule Name
Resource Group Name
Comma separated list of values
Scope Type
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Equals:Sev0,Sev1
Status of Action Rule.
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Contains:Virtual Machines,Storage Account

Action rule Name
Specifies the duration when the suppression should be applied.
Reccurent values, if applicable.In case of Weekly - [Saturday,Sunday] In case of Monthly - [1,3,5,30]
Resource Group Name
Comma separated list of values
Scope Type
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Equals:Sev0,Sev1
Status of Action Rule.
Suppression End Time. Format 12/09/2018 06:00:00 +Should be mentioned in case of Reccurent Supression Schedule - Once, Daily, Weekly or Monthly.
Suppression Start Time. Format 12/09/2018 06:00:00 +Should be mentioned in case of Reccurent Supression Schedule - Once, Daily, Weekly or Monthly.
Expected format - {<operation>:<comma separated list of values>} For eg. Contains:Virtual Machines,Storage Account
